  • City: HENDERSON

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pail was in unload when noticed leaking and when QA inspected can was dented and punctured on side as if was dropped. DescribePack: Bottom of pail had a small lead due to it being dented. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Pail was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

DescribePack: Closures came loose and liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner bottles DurationRel: 13 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was already inside a lined tote so it was placed inside the hazmat cage.

Jerrican punctured and spilled. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called upon an Admin for assistance in containing the leakage. DescribePack: The leakage stems from a loose lid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous materials spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.

DescribePack: The closure came loose and liquid leaked out which made outer label to soil. DurationRel: 15 and MitigateEffect: Pail was placed inside an lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024021810
item.description:
Report X-2024021810

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in sealed plastic bags inside corrugated carton with corrugated top spacer. Loose, cross-threaded caps on two jugs allowed spillage that soiled jugs and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. was in the QA area with outer carton wet and already dried. DescribePack: Upon inspection all the inner closures had loose closures and a small amount of liquid leaked out of every bottle and the outer carton got a little soiled. DurationRel: 44 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was taken to hazmat cage and I inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024021762
item.description:
Report X-2024021762

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs with taped caps in zip-tied plastic bags inside doublewall corrugated carton with bubble wrap filler. Loose caps on three jugs allowed leakage which soiled jugs and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to unload trailer 950021 due to a leaking hazmat, QA arrived and pkg was wet on the outer carton so QA placed inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage. DescribePack: Closures came loose and liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner bottes, this was a unprocessed hazmat as well. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA placed inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024021410
item.description:
Report X-2024021410

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-04T15:11:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-14
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic pail in corrugated carton with no filler or padding. Carton torn along one edge. Pail cracked 2/3 of length down one side, spilling powder. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024021343
item.description:
Report X-2024021343

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-05T15:11:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out for an Admin's assistance in containing the shipment. DescribePack: The metal pail is badly dented, and there appears to be a small puncture mark within the denting. The leaked contents came from that puncture mark. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous materials spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.
